structure.unit: Registration Of Certain Professions And Occupations

law.catch_line: Suspension Or Revocation Of Certificate; Reissuance

text.section: that the holder of such certificate of registration is in violation of any provision of sections ninety-eight to one hundred and seven, inclusive, or of any rule or regulation promulgated by the board;
that such certificate of registration was obtained by fraud or misrepresentation;
that any money or thing of value, except fees prescribed or authorized by said sections, was paid or received to secure the issuance of such certificate of registration;
that the holder of such certificate of registration has been guilty of a felony;
that the holder of such certificate of registration has been guilty of fraud or deceit, or of gross negligence, incompetence or misconduct, in the use of the title of landscape architect; or

that the holder of such certificate of registration has permitted or suffered his official seal to be affixed to any plans, specifications, drawings or reports, if such portions thereof as involve the practice of landscape architecture were not prepared by him or under his personal supervision by his regularly employed subordinates.
